    Value purchase -
    by Lucas,
    March 25, 2011
    
      
      4/
      5stars
    
    Great microwave for the price. It is small and
    fits in my apartment.
  
  ...

_pRange.descriptionZh: 一项内容的官方评级，如‘MPAA PG-13’。
_pRange.rdfs:comment: Official rating of a piece of content—for example,'MPAA PG-13'.
_pRange.rdfs:label: contentRating

_pRange.descriptionZh: 单条评论所给出的评分。
_pRange.rdfs:comment: The rating given in this review. Note that reviews can themselves be rated. The reviewRating applies to rating given by the review. The aggregateRating property applies to the review itself, as a creative work.
_pRange.rdfs:label: reviewRating

_examples.JSON: This example is in microdata only.
_examples.MICRODATA:
ACME Hotel Innsbruck
  A beautifully located business hotel right in the
heart of the alps. Watch the sun rise over the scenic Inn valley while
enjoying your morning coffee.
  Star rating: 
    ****
  Room rates: $100 - $240

_pRange.descriptionZh: 住宿业务或食品业的官方（例如 来自国家协会或标准机构）评级。使用author属性指示评级机构，例如，作为一个名称为(例如HOTREC、DEHOGA、WHR或Hotelstars)的机构。
_pRange.rdfs:comment: An official rating for a lodging business or food establishment, e.g. from national associations or standards bodies. Use the author property to indicate the rating organization, e.g. as an Organization with name such as (e.g. HOTREC, DEHOGA, WHR, or Hotelstars).
_pRange.rdfs:label: starRating

_properties.rdfs:comment: The author of this content or rating. Please note that author is special in that HTML 5 provides a special mechanism for indicating authorship via the rel tag. That is equivalent to this and may be used interchangeably.
_properties.rdfs:label: author

_properties.descriptionZh: 该评分系统中允许的最高评分分数，如果没有设置最高评分分数，就假定为5。
_properties.rdfs:comment: The highest value allowed in this rating system. If bestRating is omitted, 5 is assumed.
_properties.rdfs:label: bestRating

_properties.descriptionZh: 一套评分系统中的最低值。一般缺省值为1。
_properties.rdfs:comment: The lowest value allowed in this rating system. If worstRating is omitted, 1 is assumed.
_properties.rdfs:label: worstRating

_pTree.descriptionZh: 给出具体数值的评分，比如1-5分。
_pTree.rdfs:comment: A rating is an evaluation on a numeric scale, such as 1 to 5 stars.
_pTree.rdfs:label: Rating

_properties.descriptionZh: 该项的一个附加类型， 通常用于从外部词典中向微数据语法添加更加具体的类型。它表示事物和事物本身所属的类之间的关系。在RDFa语法中, 对多类型最好使用‘typeof’属性这样的本地RDFa语法. Schema.org 工具对额外类型的理解较弱，特别是外部定义的额外类型。
_properties.rdfs:comment: An additional type for the item, typically used for adding more specific types from external vocabularies in microdata syntax. This is a relationship between something and a class that the thing is in. In RDFa syntax, it is better to use the native RDFa syntax - the 'typeof' attribute - for multiple types. Schema.org tools may have only weaker understanding of extra types, in particular those defined externally.
_properties.rdfs:label: additionalType

      Recorded on a terrace of Girona a sunday morning

_examples.MICRODATA:
George Bush, the
  41st President of the United States
  is the father of
  
    George W. Bush, the
    43rd President of the United States.
_examples.PRE-MARKUP: George Bush, the 41st President of the United States is the father of George W. Bush, the 43rd President of the United States.
_examples.RDFA:
George Bush, the
  41st President of the United States
  is the father of
  
    George W. Bush, the
    43rd President of the United States.

_properties.descriptionZh: 描述的子属性。 用于消除与其他类似项之间歧义的简短描述。 其它属性（特别是名称）的信息对于消歧义可能是必要的。
_properties.rdfs:comment: A sub property of description. A short description of the item used to disambiguate from other, similar items. Information from other properties (in particular, name) may be necessary for the description to be useful for disambiguation.
_properties.rdfs:label: disambiguatingDescription

_properties.rdfs:comment: The identifier property represents any kind of identifier for any kind of Thing, such as ISBNs, GTIN codes, UUIDs etc. Schema.org provides dedicated properties for representing many of these, either as textual strings or as URL (URI) links. See background notes for more details.
_properties.rdfs:label: identifier

_examples.MICRODATA:
Mom's World Famous Banana Bread
  By John Smith,
  May 8, 2009
  
  This classic banana bread recipe comes
  from my mom -- the walnuts add a nice texture and flavor to the banana
  bread.
  Prep Time: 15 minutes
  Cook time: 1 hour
  Yield: 1 loaf
  Tags: Low fat
  
    Nutrition facts:
    240 calories,
    9 grams fat
  
  Ingredients:
  - 3 or 4 ripe bananas, smashed
  - 1 egg
  - 3/4 cup of sugar
  ...
  Instructions:
  
  Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Mix in the ingredients in a bowl. Add
  the flour last. Pour the mixture into a loaf pan and bake for one hour.
  
  140 comments:
  
    
    
  
  From Janel, May 5 -- thank you, great recipe!
  ...
_examples.PRE-MARKUP:
Mom's World Famous Banana Bread
By John Smith, May 8, 2009

This classic banana bread recipe comes from my mom -- the walnuts add a nice

Yield: 1 loaf
Tags: Low fat
Nutrition facts:
240 calories, 9 grams fat
Ingredients:
- 3 or 4 ripe bananas, smashed
- 1 egg
- 3/4 cup of sugar
...
Instructions:
 Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Mix in the ingredients in a bowl. Add the
 flour last. Pour the mixture into a loaf pan and bake for one hour.
140 comments:
From Janel, May 5 -- thank you, great recipe!
...

_properties.rdfs:comment: An image of the item. This can be a URL or a fully described ImageObject.
_properties.rdfs:label: image

    Open: Daily from 11:00am till 8pm
    Phone: 555-0100-3344
    View our menu.

      Phone: 555-0100-3344

_properties.descriptionZh: 表示这个东西是描述的主要实体的页面
_properties.rdfs:comment: Indicates a page (or other CreativeWork) for which this thing is the main entity being described. See background notes for details.
_properties.rdfs:label: mainEntityOfPage

_properties.descriptionZh: 潜在的与之搭配的动作，它描述了一个理想化的动作，在这个动作中，这个东西会起到“对象”的作用。
_properties.rdfs:comment: Indicates a potential Action, which describes an idealized action in which this thing would play an 'object' role.
_properties.rdfs:label: potentialAction

_properties.rdfs:comment: URL of a reference Web page that unambiguously indicates the item's identity. E.g. the URL of the item's Wikipedia page, Wikidata entry, or official website.
_properties.rdfs:label: sameAs

isRangeOf.descriptionZh: 一项内容的官方评级，如‘MPAA PG-13’。
isRangeOf.rdfs:comment: Official rating of a piece of content—for example,'MPAA PG-13'.
isRangeOf.rdfs:label: contentRating

isRangeOf.descriptionZh: 单条评论所给出的评分。
isRangeOf.rdfs:comment: The rating given in this review. Note that reviews can themselves be rated. The reviewRating applies to rating given by the review. The aggregateRating property applies to the review itself, as a creative work.
isRangeOf.rdfs:label: reviewRating

_examples.JSON: This example is in microdata only.
_examples.MICRODATA:
ACME Hotel Innsbruck
  A beautifully located business hotel right in the
heart of the alps. Watch the sun rise over the scenic Inn valley while
enjoying your morning coffee.
  Star rating: 
    ****
  Room rates: $100 - $240
_examples.PRE-MARKUP:
ACME Hotel Innsbruck
A beautifully located business hotel right in the
heart of the alps. Watch the sun rise over the scenic Inn valley while
enjoying your morning coffee.
  Star rating: ****
  Room rates: $100 - $240

_examples.RDFA: This example is in microdata only.

isRangeOf.descriptionZh: 住宿业务或食品业的官方（例如 来自国家协会或标准机构）评级。使用author属性指示评级机构，例如，作为一个名称为(例如HOTREC、DEHOGA、WHR或Hotelstars)的机构。
isRangeOf.rdfs:comment: An official rating for a lodging business or food establishment, e.g. from national associations or standards bodies. Use the author property to indicate the rating organization, e.g. as an Organization with name such as (e.g. HOTREC, DEHOGA, WHR, or Hotelstars).
isRangeOf.rdfs:label: starRating

rdfs:comment: A rating is an evaluation on a numeric scale, such as 1 to 5 stars.
rdfs:label: Rating
